PageTitle: cu warm-standby-mode (Global CGN address pool view)
FuncDef:
The cu warm-standby-mode command configures the warm backup mode for a dynamic CGN address pool.
The undo cu warm-standby-mode command enables a device to exit the warm backup mode of a CGN dynamic address pool.
By default, no warm backup mode is configured for a dynamic address pool.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In CU separation mode, when N:1 warm backup coexists with distributed CGN, to configure the warm backup mode of the CGN global address pool, run the cu warm-standby-mode command.
Prerequisites
The cu-agent command has been run on the device.
